name: Fiorella Saldonid
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
Good morning,


Hope all is well! My name is Fio and I’m highly interested in the position. I’m a highly social person who isn’t afraid to approach people and make new friends. I have done it all from retail, office administration, food industry, behavior technician, saleswoman, and even shadowed at another dispensary in Commerce, CA called Suprimo’s. I am confident that I am a good fit for the position because I’m able to talk to anybody and have a positive attitude! I’ve attached my resume and some pictures from several shoots I’ve done below. You can also follow my Instagram: feezyfbaby or YouTube channel Fio Sal to get a better look at the kind of person I am. If you are interested please contact me at 909-609-4701. Thank you for your consideration. 









Peace and Love,


Fio
experience:
